name: Bojhan's Drupal.org style
description:
This cleans up the issue queue.

https://www.gittip.com/Bojhan/
additional_info:
0.4
- Project now available at https://github.com/Bojhan/Drupal.org-stylish
- Removed footer/header
- Optimised fieldset issue queue

0.3
- Removing text format styling, because d.o now collapses it (Thanks to xjm + chx, for the tip)

0.2
- Removed most of the header, power users don't really need it. 
- Removed titles that often don't add any new information
- Updated styling of the search box/button to better match the minimal style

0.1
- Changed the way Dreditor buttons look
- Issue comments are now full width (from amateescu)
- The meta block has a bunch of design tweaks.
- Removed file icons.

Known bugs:
- In short issues the meta block can overlap with the first comments.

Credits:
- Dawehner
